revised_title: The Thermal Emissivity of Thin Wires in Air: A Study of the Influence of Shape and Size on Emissivity
tldr: This paper investigates the thermal emissivity of thin wires in air and explores the influence of shape and size on emissivity. The authors found that the emissivity of thin wires is affected by their dimensions, with the cooling action of the wires being influenced by their shape and size.
